name: Sperm Race [Local Coop]
description:
Press W or P as fast as you can to reach the Eggcell first. 

Play this on one keyboard with a friend. If you dont have friends, play it alone: right hand vs. left hand

:(

DISCLAIMER

This is our first game, alot of beer was involved ...

Soundtrack made purely with mouth sounds. 

We would appreciate a small donation for beer so we can produce more stupid game ideas.

Cheers!
